html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-02242016-04-15,  ,  AAFC,  , 
ActPlant Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Introduced Forest Pest Compensation Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the INTRODUCED FOREST PEST COMPENSATION REGULATIONS in order to (1) continue the pest management strategy of eradication for Asian Longhorn Beetle in order to protect non-infested areas of Canada, biodiversity and Canada’s natural hardwood forests and related industries; (2) meet the compensation needs of tree owners by providing compensation them for the replacement of trees ordered destroyed as part of the eradication strategy, while continuing to promote awareness and encourage reporting; and (3) revise the scope of the Introduced Forest Pest Compasation Regulations to reflect current policy objectives included in the pest management strategy for those pests by repealing all references to Emerald Ash Borer and Brown Spruce Longhorn Beetle, and the compensation provisions relating to them.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0071 Publication Date: 2016-05-04
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Introduced Forest Pest Compensation Regulations
